name: Nezuko
description: Telegram Group Management Bot Written In Python Using Pyrogram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

SUDO_USERS_ID.description: Sudo users have full access to everythin, don't trust anyone... ex:- 123456 654311 123456

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: For logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

ARQ_API_URL.description: For Music Downloading And Many More Things... Don't change this value

MESSAGE_DUMP_CHAT.description: Chat_id of the group where useless things will go

RSS_DELAY.description: Delay in which RSS will send updates in chat
